body:
Well my problem is...
I think my ping is not very good. And on American servers I get from 80-400 ms..
But my cps is high cause i try to butterfly click (around 9-13 cps). Although I have (I think so) higher cps, I get the first hit later.  What do you think? Is it really so much about ping or am I just bad? There were probably many discussions like this but I will maybe get better Internet soon and I would be interested if you can get much better hits with ping...
